notification.comingsoon: Eto ifihan awon asiwaju n bo lona!

points.post_desc: You can earn point by posting regularly. Posting gives you 15 points.
points.comment_desc: Each comment you make helps you to grow your audience and make friendship but also earns you 5 points.
points.checkin_desc: Checking in on eSteem app gives you 0.25 points and helps you stay connected with your friends.
points.vote_desc: By voting you give reward to other creators and show your appreciation but also earn 0.01 x vote weight points.
points.reblog_desc: Share what post you like with your friends and earn 1 points.
points.login_desc: When you login into eSteem app you are entitled to earn 100 points automatically.
points.checkin_extra_desc: Consistent use of app gives you extra chances to earn more 10 points, be more active and earn more.

profile.unclaimed_rewards: Ere ti a o ti gba
profile.havent_commented: koti si oro iwoye kankan bayi

voters.no_user: A ko ri oruko akole yi.

login.signin_title: Gbigba gbogbobo anfaani to ro mo lilo esteem
login.description: Ori ero ilewo re ni gbogbo awon credentials re o wa. Gbogbo credentials re o di yiyo to ba ti jade!
login.steemconnect_description: Ti o ba fe ki oro atewole asiri re je fifipamo sori ero yi, o le lo steemconnect.
login.steemconnect_fee_description: Steemconnect may charge some fees from your reward transactions

side_menu.logout_text: Se o da o loju pe o fe jade kuro?

header.title: Se atewole lati seto ate igbawole re bi ose fe

editor.title: Akole

alert.success_shared: Oro akosile re ti di titan ka
alert.permission_text: Jowo, Losi ibi iseto ero ilewo re, ki o si se atunse awon ase to fun eSteem app.
alert.invalid_pincode: PIN yi o se tewogba, jowo sematuyewo, ki o tun te.
alert.remove_alert: Se o da o loju pe ofe yo kuro?
alert.clear_alert: Are you sure you want to clear?

auth.invalid_username: Oruko akole yi o ri itewogba, jowo se ayewo ki o tun te
auth.already_logged: Oti wole, jowo se afikun account miran
